name: Funny Basketball - 2 Player
description:
Funny Basketball - 2 Player Games free - Best Basketball game with amazing physics !

Funny basketball is the free game for basketball fans. Best physics game free.
Battle with your friends, funny, amazing game play and physics.
You control to get ball and make player bouncy and shoot the ball in hoops. Funny Basketball is the best game on Store.

* Features:
- Local multiplayer
- Fun Basketball game with amazing physics.
- Two mode: One player, two players. Multiplayer will coming soon.
- Multiple character skin.
- Beautiful graphics, pixel art game.

* How to play:
- Tap button to jump and release to shoot the basketball. Calculator to shooting ball in hoops.
- Get 5 goals to win.
